mapper.select: select a.role_Id, a.role_name, a.role_desc, a.create_date, a.create_user, a.ord, b.user_id from sc_role a left join (select role_id, user_id from role_user_rela where user_id = #{userId}) b on a.role_id = b.role_id order by ord

select role_Id, role_name, role_desc, create_date, create_user, ord from sc_role where 1=1
and (role_name like '%${keyword}%' or role_desc like '%${keyword}%')
order by ord

select a.menu_id "id", a.menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", b.menu_id "id2" from (select distinct (m.menu_id) menu_id, m.menu_name menu_name, menu_order, m.menu_pid menu_pid from sc_menu m) a left join (select menu_id from role_menu_rela where role_id = #{roleId}) b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id order by a.menu_order, a.menu_id

select aa.id "id", aa.name "name", aa.name as "text", aa.pid as "pid", aa.tp as "tp", aa.ord as ord, icon as "icon", b.data_id "seldata" from ( select ds_id id, name, pid, 'fl' as tp, ord, 'fa fa-cubes' as icon from olap_subject_type union all select tid+100000 as id, tdesc as name, type_id as pid, 'data' as tp, tid as ord, 'fa fa-cube' as icon from olap_table_meta ) aa left join (select * from role_data_rela where role_id = #{roleId}) b on aa.id - 100000 = b.data_id order by "tp", ord
